scenario: ABC LLC incurred the following expenses: Personal Lunch: $7,087.72, Political Contributions: $9,618.45, Office Supplies: $5,012.64, Traffic Fines: $3,780.77.
question: Calculate the total deductible trade or business expenses under I.R.C. § 162.
answer_explanation: Only ordinary and necessary business expenses are deductible. Total: $5,012.64.
